rows.label: tev061101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Koko about the Nopon caravans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Koko about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Koko about the Follow Ball.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Koko about recent developments.

rows.label: tev061101_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Koko about secret treasure in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Koko about recent developments.

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0001
rows.name: Friend can find Nopon caravans all over Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0002
rows.name:
Closest one is in Sandy Bum Canyon.
That is place friends call "Oblivia."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0003
rows.name: Has friend been there? It is nice caravan, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0004
rows.name:
Well, leader there is really greedy. Meh-meh!
Might try to take poor friend to cleaners.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0008
rows.name: What relief to hear little Tatsu is safe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0009
rows.name:
Yes, Tatsu always stuffing face and bragging and
acting pretentious—but as big crybabies go,
Tatsu not really so bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Tatsu has finest coat of all the littlepon, so maybe
friend can ruffle fur of Tatsu whenever friend needs
cheering up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Anyway, please take good care of our little
pain-in-butt![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0016
rows.name: Ah, so friend is using our secret Nopon treasure?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0017
rows.name:
Follow Ball is very useful! Just imagine where friend
want to go, and fwoom! Ball flies off in that direction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0018
rows.name: ...Meh? Sometimes Follow Ball go in circles or get lost?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0019
rows.name:
Well, nothing is perfect. Follow Ball really not much
more clever than Tatsu in the end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0020
rows.name: Try to look past failings and give it lots of love.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0026
rows.name:
When friendship treaty was signed, Elder Nan—who
had been traveling around Mira—got crazy idea that
all Nopon should move to New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0027
rows.name:
Caravan leaders like Koko not about to pack up
and leave, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0028
rows.name:
Caravans are important commercial centers,
as well as safe haven for traveling Nopon merchants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0029
rows.name:
If caravans pack up and go, merchants perilous journey
get even perilouser! No, caravans must stay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0030
rows.name:
Deep in Noctilum cave, Koko once stumble upon
statues of two giants that were strangely familiar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0031
rows.name:
When Koko tell Curator friend about it,
excitement was impossible to contain![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0032
rows.name:
Curator start jumping up and down and saying,
"That one of missing collectibles!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0033
rows.name:
If friend also looking for these statues, then friend
should check corners of caves veeeery carefully.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0034
rows.name:
Elder Nan is very spoiled, but despite complaints,
Nopon love him all the same.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0035
rows.name:
If Tatsu hope to become next caravan leader,
Tatsu should watch Elder Nan like hawk with glasses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0036
rows.name: ...And then do exact opposite of Elder Nan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061101_MSG0037
rows.name:
All Nopon really want is for Tatsu to be self.
Time in human city will give Tatsu all the knowledge
he need to become good leader.[ST:wait ]
